author: ritchiem
msg: QPID-2583 : Update tests to correctly throw ConfigurationException where requried and to correctly configure configuration

author: ritchiem
msg: QPID-2582 : Print stack traces if the registry fails to clean up as a result of a failed InVM broker startup

author: ritchiem
msg: QPID-2580 : Correct build order to allow plugins to use QpidTestCase

author: ritchiem
msg: QPID-2575 : Add getClientID to SessionModel and standardise use accross 0-8/0-10, 0-10 does not appear to provide a client ID so maintaining use of Principal Name. This means migration between 0-8 and 0-10 will not behave as expected.
Correct erroneous usages of session.getPrincipal when comparing with queue.getOwner is requried. Queue owners are the client id not the authenticated user.

author: ritchiem
msg: QPID-2575 : Create Connection and Session models to correctly expose the Owning Session. Addressed issue where getPrincipal was used in error to identify queue owner. Session model now allows access to this in a protocol independent way.
